title: (x) customized gothic "peakaiv" - Helvetica {Marc O}
content: I lost my fonts and this one I happened to have saved some letters as vectors back a few years ago. The curve at the bottom right of the a is something I added, but other than that, can anyone determine which font this is? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101102161102im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68668.gif)
author: joesomebody

comments.content: Didn't look at the k. Nice catch Marc.
